explains: adv. 直到此时，迄今为止；在这以前

sentences.en: They reported that clouds are an important and heretofore uninvestigated contributor to the climate.
sentences.cn: 他们报告说，云是影响气候的一个重要因素，但迄今尚未进行过调查研究。

sentences.en: Heretofore that information has been passed from one living thing to another.
sentences.cn: 从前，这种信息只是从一个生命体传给另一个。

sentences.en: Now the business we have, heretofore, you can speak with my aforementioned attorney.
sentences.cn: 迄今为止我们做的交易你可以和我前面提到的律师谈。
